name: lo
description: Lightweight utility library for the browser.
author: Lars Jung <lrsjng@gmail.com> (https://larsjung.de)

scripts.karma: node test && node ghu build:test && karma start .karma.js
scripts.cover: isparta cover --dir coverage --report text --report html test
scripts.check: npm run -s lint && npm run -s test
scripts.precommit: npm run -s check && npm run -s build
